name: Home Key
description:
A vaporwave keyboard tower defense game

Controls and Gameplay:

  • Keyboard keys with green outline can be pressed to activate a tower.

Shoot the enemies before they get to the home key!

Created by: Horizon Drift

Game Jam: Global Game Jam 2019
